*************************
[NICOS] Cache User Manual
*************************

The |CI| is a standalone program designed for reading and managing - but not
limited to - the NICOS Cache. Any cache that works with the *Cache Protocol*
described in the `NICOS Cache Documentation`_ can be read by the |CI|.

=================
